questions.question: This arc is notable for its depiction of the Straw Hat Pirates' battle against the Donquixote Family. What is...?
Taking place on a ship graveyard, this arc introduces the character of Brook and the concept of the Florian Triangle. What is...?
This arc takes place on a floating island and involves the Straw Hat Pirates in a struggle against a despotic ruler with the power of light. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and manipulate darkness. What is...?
This technique used by Luffy in Gear Fourth involves inflating his muscles and using Haki to maintain form. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and control earthquakes. What is...?
This character, a member of the Worst Generation, possesses the ability to create a 'Room' and manipulate objects and people within it. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a musician known for his long nose and ability to create powerful sound-based attacks. Who is...?
This character, the leader of the On Air Pirates, is known for their Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, enabling them to transform into a model of the mythical creature Yamata no Orochi. Who is...?
